title: 820-4924-A No Green Light/Charge With Original Charger
message:
So i've got an 820-4924-A which won't charge when using original charger. The light won't come on the charger there is no voltage at J7000 and it's not charging. I've tried a different charging socket (known good in another macbook) which also doesn't work. If I use a chinese charger the green light appears and the machine powers up and works, charges fully no issues. 
I'm wondering what the issue could be maybe u7000/u7001? Can't see any liquid damage on this board it's clean

title: 820-4924-A No Green Light/Charge With Original Charger
message:
Usually D7010, or Q7180.
Original charger is smart enough (has an embedded processor) to detect leakage on input stage.

title: 820-4924-A No Green Light/Charge With Original Charger
message: Yeah you were 100% correct it was Q7180 - tried D7010 first was same then replaced Q7180 and it's working now. First time i've had to replace it to be honest!
